channel.title: How to change weapon animations on emulous base?
channel.description:
Ok, so i have an emulous base. I dont know where i can change the animations for my barrelchest anchor. It hits like a scimitar and I'd like to make it closer to the real thing. I think i have the animation ID but im not sure. Also i dont know where to even find the weapon animations. Please help.
Thanks

item.title: How to change weapon animations on emulous base?

item.description:
@mod_fr0z3n wrote:

This is an emulous base.

item.title: How to change weapon animations on emulous base?
item.dc:creator: @Ii_Claw_iI Ii Claw iI
item.description:
@Ii_Claw_iI wrote:

Open up Client.java and press ctrl+f then find “wepanim” add the anchor there.
